line.speaker: First Mate Bartholomew
line.text: Back again? What have you found this time? Let me see, now.

responses.response: One...ah...handcrafted wig for the would-be captain.

line.speaker: First Mate Bartholomew
line.text: Hm? This looks… so very familiar…

line.speaker: First Mate Bartholomew
line.text: Yes, my eyes do not betray me! It’s the very image of captainly beauty!

line.speaker: First Mate Bartholomew
line.text: It’s so pure, woven of such lovely fibers, like the foam of rushing tides that birthed Aphrodite herself! Fantastique! I’m in love, simply in love!

line.speaker: First Mate Bartholomew
line.text: I knew I could count on you, ma cherie!
